verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֗חַ <WH5329> lam-natz-Tze-ach, o the chief Musician לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> [Tle-Da-Vid[A Psalm] of David אָ֘מַ֤ר <WH559> 'a-Mar hath said נָבָ֣ל <WH5036> na-Val The fool בְּ֭לִבּוֹ <WH3820> be-lib-bo in his heart אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein There אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; [There is] no God הִֽשְׁחִ֗יתוּ <WH7843> hish-Chi-tu, They are corrupt הִֽתְעִ֥יבוּ <WH8581> hit-'I-vu they have done abominable עֲלִילָ֗ה <WH5949> 'a-li-Lah, works אֵ֣ין <WH369> 'ein is no עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth טֽוֹב׃ <WH2896> Tov. good

יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh The LORD מִשָּׁמַיִם֮ <WH8064> mish-sha-ma-Yim from heaven הִשְׁקִ֪יף <WH8259> hish-Kif looked down עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- upon בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- upon the children אָ֫דָ֥ם <WH120> 'a-Dam of men לִ֭רְאוֹת <WH7200> Lir-'ot to see הֲיֵ֣שׁ <WH3426> ha-Yesh if there מַשְׂכִּ֑יל <WH7919> mas-Kil; were any that did understand דֹּ֝רֵשׁ <WH1875> Do-resh [and] seek אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> E-lo-Him. God

הַכֹּ֥ל <WH3605> hak-Kol have all סָר֮ <WH5493> sar They are all gone aside יַחְדָּ֪ו <WH3162> yach-Dav they are [all] together נֶ֫אֱלָ֥חוּ <WH444> ne-'e-La-chu become filthy אֵ֤ין <WH369> 'ein There עֹֽשֵׂה־ <WH6213> 'o-seh- [there is] none that doeth ט֑וֹב <WH2896> Tov; good אֵ֝֗ין <WH369> 'Ein, is no גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- even אֶחָֽד׃ <WH259> 'e-Chad. no not one

הֲלֹ֥א <WH3808> ha-Lo not יָדְעוּ֮ <WH3045> ya-de-'U no knowledge כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> po-'a-Lei Have all the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> 'A-ven of iniquity אֹכְלֵ֣י <WH398> 'o-che-Lei ;who eat up עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> 'Am-mi my people אָ֣כְלוּ <WH398> 'A-che-lu [as] they eat לֶ֑חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem; bread יְ֝הוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh not upon the LORD לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo not קָרָֽאוּ׃ <WH7121> ka-Ra-'u. and call

שָׁ֤ם׀ <WH8033> sham There פָּ֣חֲדוּ <WH6342> Pa-cha-du fear פָ֑חַד <WH6343> Fa-chad; There were they in great כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- For אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <WH430> E-lo-Him, for God בְּד֣וֹר <WH1755> be-Dor [is] in the generation צַדִּֽיק׃ <WH6662> tzad-Dik. of the righteous

עֲצַת־ <WH6098> 'a-tzat- the counsel עָנִ֥י <WH6041> 'a-Ni of the poor תָבִ֑ישׁוּ <WH954> ta-Vi-shu; Ye have shamed כִּ֖י <WH3588> ki But יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh because the LORD מַחְסֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4268> mach-Se-hu. [is] his refuge

מִ֥י <WH4310> mi Oh יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit-Ten Oh that מִצִּיּוֹן֮ <WH6726> mitz-tzi-yOn [were come] out of Zion יְשׁוּעַ֪ת <WH3444> ye-shu-'At the salvation יִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> yis-Ra-'El of Israel בְּשׁ֣וּב <WH7725> be-Shuv bringeth back יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah-weh when the LORD שְׁב֣וּת <WH7622> she-Vut the captivity עַמּ֑וֹ <WH5971> am-Mo; of his people יָגֵ֥ל <WH1523> ya-Gel shall rejoice יַ֝עֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko, Jacob יִשְׂמַ֥ח <WH8055> yis-Mach shall be glad יִשְׂרָֽאֵל׃ <WH3478> yis-Ra-'el [and] Israel
